basic.description: This course covers topics such as food spoilage, food poisoning, food-bornepathogens, food laws and regulations, as well as HACCP and risk management.Emphasis is placed on current issues related to the safety and quality of food.
basic.subject: FOS
basic.title: Food Safety and Quality

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: HUN 1201 and FOS 3026, or departmental approval.
